title: No. 6 Virginia Tech opens home stand with East Tennessee State - VT hokiesports.com
content: No. 6 Virginia Tech opens home stand with East Tennessee State  VT hokiesports.com
description: BLACKSBURG, Va. â€“ The No. 6 Virginia Tech softball team is set to open its home slate on Wednesday, hosting East Tennessee State in a single game beginning at 4 p.m. The game will be broadcast live on ACC Network.
